text.tspan: A Component's Update & Callback step in detail
Callback and Update steps will never
happen at the same time, and will be
executed after each other if necessary.
A callback step is for quick data processing
An update step is for (periodic) calculations
If any code in these steps calls/sends an OwnThread Operation
of the component itself or its master or slave, this operation
will be executed immediately and not be put in the Message Queue
Note: SlaveActivity have their callback step
executed by their master component, while
their update step is only executed during a
